title: Technology Summer Analyst
shortDescription: My third internship at Citi. I was part of the devops, infrastructure and internal tools team, where I worked on applications made to serve Citi developers.
impactPoints: Enhanced observability of applications by instrumenting 30+ Spring Boot microservices with OpenTelemetry, resulting in better observability and monitoring of service logs, metrics and traces
Automating daily API regression tests using JUnit, REST-Assured and TestNG, integrating results into testing dashboards of Citi’s internal framework and reducing test times by 50% on average
Implemented method-level security in Java and SQL to restrict user permissions using Spring Security, following a test driven development approach

title: Full Stack Engineer Intern
shortDescription: At DrawDream, I worked closely with the founders to develop their web-based education platform, catered towards tech workers. It offered services such as leetcode coaching, system design tutoring sessions and more.
impactPoints: Developed backend of an education/mentoring platform in React, MongoDB, ExpressJS, NodeJS, translating user stories and implementing features such as session booking, cancelling, integrating calendar updates, authentication and authorization using middleware
Managed the creation, time allocation of the tasks when given a broad goal, successfully completing all subtasks forming the overall task while providing guidance to a fellow intern

title: Technology Summer Analyst
shortDescription: My second summer at Citi, during which I worked on the post-trade data analytics team. I worked on modernizing our CI/CD pipelines, automating infrastructure as well as contributing to data analysis pipelines.
impactPoints: Developed an application in python to automatically migrate 170+ pipelines from legacy CI/CD tools like Jenkins to Citi’s new inner-source CI/CD framework, saving hundreds of engineering hours and automating migrations
Used blackduck coverity to fail CI builds of Java components that contained vulnerabilities, preventing over 20 known open source vulnerabilities from making it to production
Configured Ansible and a python-based CD pipeline, writing Ansible playbooks and shell scripts to provision linux and unix servers, utilizing Ansible’s support for infratructure as code

title: Full Stack Engineer Intern
shortDescription: At Quadratic sound, I worked as a fullstack engineer on a web application that was used for event management. I worked on enhancing features, adding REST API endpoints and automating some of our test steps.
impactPoints: Translated user stories into deliverables and implemented features in SvelteKit for an event management system
Automated test data seeding using TypeScript and JavaScript for easier testing of local builds and remote builds
Used SvelteKit’s support for API routes to implement REST APIs accepting JSON encoded payloads, integrating OAuth 2.0 for better endpoint security
Refactored existing svelte application for better semantic separation of concerns by separating business logic from presentation layers

title: Chatbot Engineering Intern
shortDescription: At ImmiCan, I was part of the team responsible for designing and implementing a chatbot and RAG pipeline, connected to a knowledge-base of immigration resources useful for newcomes to Canada.
impactPoints: Designed and implemented a RAG pipeline using OpenAI’s Embedding API, Langchain, and ChromaDB with Llama2 70B to power a chatbot connected to a custom knowledge-base
Built a performant backend pipeline with Flask and optimized embedding workflows and retrieval logic using Langchain and ChromaDB, increasing response relevance

title: Technology Summer Analyst
shortDescription: My very first internship at Citi. I worked on the Citi Velocity Data capture & engineering team. My work consisted of data engineering, as well as monitoring and health checking critical services.
impactPoints: Implemented a health checking service using Spring Boot that monitored the status of critical downstream applications our team uses, automating health checks and alerts on these services, reducing downtime by 40%
Automated build and deployment of spring boot microservice using Docker, Jenkins, Helm, and ECS, implementing multi-stage builds and build caching to decrease deployment times

title: Software Engineer
shortDescription: At Inwit, I was introduced to the world of web and app development. I was part of the team working to develop a platform focused on sustainable takeout containers.
impactPoints: Refactored and separated code into components for better reusability
Implemented pages using React's core features like hooks, state management, etc.
Implemented a QR code scanner using React
